title: Miu Miu invite font
content:
Any ideas, I would love this font!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [miumiu.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110403051409/http:/typophile.com/files/miumiu.jpg) | 69.68 KB |
author: marc

comments.content: This looks more as if someone set the type on a mobile phone. I'll be curious what the ID is myself.

Not quite that font, but similar:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/winmenu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110403051409/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/winmenu/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/winmenu/")

You'll may be love that one to:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/dos-screen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110403051409/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/dos-screen/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/dos-screen/")
Cheers guys, not quite it though. Any suggestions on where I might find it elsewhere?
The reason I think you should be looking at cellphone displays is simple. MiuMiu is a high-end fashion line which can afford to be -- read: must be this way -- conceptual and esoteric.
